Published Apps.label: Launcher Ops 2
Published Apps.description: Manage and Benchmark your favorite launchers in Android. Detect anomalies, permission usages and clones that could potentially ruin your android homescreen experience.

Published Apps.label: Launchers Quick Tile
Published Apps.description: Swap launcher homescreens from your statusbar quicktile section. Supports up to and includes Android 12.

Published Apps.label: Launchers Quick Tile 2
Published Apps.description: Swap launcher homescreens from your statusbar quicktile section. Android 13 and above required.

Published Apps.label: Truesight
Published Apps.description: Inspired by Steam Charts, Truesight is a steam companion app built for Android that provides gamers with trending information from steam such as live steam service status, online count, game peak player counts, data matrixs, trending game information,news and top sellers. You can also create virtual rigs for compatibility comparison data and chart your own player counts matrixs. My first app using a background workflow and database.

Published Apps.label: Carpentar
Published Apps.description: An Icon Pack Manager that allows you to benchmark the compatibility of launcher apps, extract icons and resources as well as craft your own icons!

Libraries.label: Google Play Publisher API
Libraries.description: Java library for android that builds off of a rest api by Rajkumar. Pulls publisher info for a selected app off of Google Play.

Libraries.label: Fluent Popup Menu
Libraries.description: A custom widget for android that acts as a context menu for objects and views. The menu will appear above the object, with or without an arrow, and you can use the prebuilt menu or add in a custom view. Code is currently being optimized for release for the public.

Libraries.label: Expandable Preference Group
Libraries.description: A custom preference group for android that expands on click to show preferences held inside the group and can condense them for a cleaner UI.

Libraries.label: SwitchBar
Libraries.description: A custom widget inspired by ONE UI for AOSP. Hasn't been updated in awhile...

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: Bionx Dashboard
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: My first app that controled tweaks and settings to my custom rom, Bionx.

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: HTC Flip
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: My first HTC Sense exclusive app that managed launcher apps for the HTC Series devices. Later, it was taken down for attempting of impersonating HTC...According to Google Police.

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: Fellow
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: An attempt to create an html frienldy facebook lite app. It was taken down when facebook lite launched.

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: Sapphire Launcher
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: My first custom launcher based on AOSP by Slim Roms. It was launched in 2015 and later unpublished to be upgraded with a pixal launcher clone.

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: Sapphyx Launcher
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: Launched in 2017, Sapphyx Launcher was my first launcher that was based on Google Pixel Launcher port to the public and offered an array of cool new features and customization.

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: Drywall - Wallpaper Mananger
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: My attempt at a replicating the google wallpapers app from my perspective. Decided that Google did it better.

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: Mystery Shopping List App
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: Taking on a project for the girlfriend. Coming mid 2026

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: GCA Launcher
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: Gocal's Custom Android Launcher. Launched in late 2018, retired in 2021 for deprecation reasons. Scheduled to make a full return towards the end of 2026-2027.

Upcoming or Unpublished.label: Drosera Launcher
Upcoming or Unpublished.description: My own take on a gaming android launcher designed for handhelds and android tv boxes. Coming mid-late 2026
